cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Order_Templa.name: cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Order_Template__c
cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Order_Templa.description: Stores the details of the relationship between product assortment and order template.

cgcloud__Order_Template__c.description: Reference to a order template assigned to the assortment.

cgcloud__Product_Assortment__c.description: Reference to the assortment to which the order template relation belongs.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the product assortment order template record.
